channel.title: ICE’d Out on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in ICE’d Out on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: These Are the 15 New York Officials ICE and NYPD Arrested in Manhattan
item.description: More than a dozen elected officials were arrested in or around 26 Federal Plaza in New York City, where ICE detains people in what courts have ruled are unsanitary conditions.
